description: Fosters an understanding of the effects technological development and human population have had on the earth's ecology. Features Hugh Downs, Margaret Mead, John D. Rockefeller III, Lady Barbara Ward Jackson, Harrison Brown, and Walter Orr Roberts. Narrated by Raymond Burr.
